name: Deathball (Drifter's Workshop)
description:
Created for mini jam 108: Seaside!

Fight the oncoming horde of rabid zombies. The fans in the stands have gone berserk. Armed with your trust baseball bat and a nearby ball shooter keep the horde back for as long as you can.

Controls---------

Space - Fire ball

Lmb - Swing Bat

(I hope you enjoy it! I hope to update it in a couple of weeks with general bugfixes, aesthetic changes and gameplay improvements)
